SUBJ: ANDEAN MEETING AND DECISION 24


REFS: (A) STATE 078696: (B) CARACAS 3331


BOLIVIAN INTEGRATION SPECIALISTS HAVE ASSURED EMBASSY THAT DECISION
24 DOES NOT APPEAR ON AGENDA FOR APRIL 22 MEETING. BOLIVIANS STATE
THAT COLOMBIANS HAVE INFORMALLY PROPOSED JOINT AND IDENTICAL REGULATION


OF DECISION 24 BY ALL PACT COUNTRIES BUT GENERAL AGREEMENT DOES NOT
EXIST. GOB ITSELF HOPES TO BUILD SUPPORT FOR SPECIAL, MORE LENIENT
APPLICATION OF DECISION 24 TO BOLIVIA.
STEDMAN








NNN
